resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

The Toorcamp #noc is proud to present several options for fast, free WiFi this year! With a 10Gbps uplink graceously offered by Rock Island Internet, and backups provided by SpaceX, we should have plenty of bandwidth to meet your needs. However, wireless spectrum is a scarce resource, so PLEASE use our WiFi instead of setting up your own!


You'll likely want to use the default settings. This protects you and your device from fake Access Points impersonating the Toorcamp network, and blocks all incoming traffic from others. You get a safe, authenticated, outbound-only NATed connection to the Internet.


However, if you would like a public IP address, or want to host a service from your device, you can choose our new "Fully Exposed" service, with dedicated IPv4 and IPv6 addresses for your device. You may also register DNS entries under toor.camp for your device/services. However, YOU are responsible for the security of your device! It is DIRECTLY connected to the Internet with NO FIREWALL and NO ADDRESS TRANSLATION. Proceed with this profile ONLY if you fully understand the implications of this.
